content.p: The easiest and quickest way to pay your study related fees and charges Use NottinghamHub to pay your tuition fees, accommodation and other payments relating to your studies. Note: The university no longer accepts payments in cash, card payments over the phone or in person with a debit or credit card. How to make online payments in NottinghamHub Fee instalment due dates and Alternative Accommodation Payment Plan Options Use our alternative debit or credit card payment portal, powered by our partner Open Banking, Bank Transfers, Alipay and international PayPal you can pay by Flywire For direct bank transfer payments by students and other Individuals For bank transfer payments by organisations and businesses Watch out for scammers posing as university agents
